name: vivarium
description:
UPDATED to vivarium_04

iteration 4 - adding a menu (editor not hooked to anything yet), fixed some balancing issues,. etc.

Here is a quick build of what I am currently working on,. spins off of seeds and more seeds has some strange 25 min. complex noise sculpture soundtrack currently ;)

When development hits a nice milestone we will release a payed version to remove the "INSERT COIN" text message. Otherwise the free demo is the same program, and fully functional.

While zero input is required, (the system will self balance,. for the most part) some simple controls are available to the user/viewer.

Control entirely with 3 button mouse with wheel (or w/ mouse and keyboard).

Number keys 1-0 to select type (1-6 currently implemented) or Mouse Wheel.

Left Mouse Button to create selected unit.

C key to Clear all or Right Mouse Button

SPACE to generate a nnew level.., or Middle Mouse Button

M key Mutes the Music playback,. ( may take a while for long reverb and delay tails to fade fully ) This is a toggle.

objective; none

Think; Fish Tank, Lava Lamp, Terrarium, Kaleidoscope, A-life Sim, Ant Farm, Music Video, Night Light, Interactive Painting,. .


SunVox modular synthesizer

Ogg Vorbis 'Tremor' integer playback codec
